messages.subject: Re: NHK Book 2
messages.msgSnippet: ... Thanks for the scans Sec! Loved it! So this book has more than 150 pages? Also since you re going to host for 1 more month only, if you need someone to
messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "secretary" <secretarytocapt3@h...> wrote:
> 20 days left for streamload hosting
> http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3
>
> click on NHK book 2
>
> pics of...well...EVERYONE
>
>
> ****there is also a painting of AIZU's Women's Brigade...I don't
> know Japanese...but it looks like the word "Aizu"****
>
> the book is valuable because it tells little stories...for example
> Saitou's death on page 149
>
> page 143 the establishment of the Shinsengumi memorial pillar
>
> page 152 policemen

Thanks for the scans Sec! Loved it! So this book has more than 150
pages?

Also since you're going to host for 1 more month only, if you need
someone to continue hosting the files let me know. I'm willing to
donate bandwidth every month since I'm a heavy streamload user anyway.

~wounds

messages.messageBody:
20 days left for streamload hosting
http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3

click on NHK book 2

pics of...well...EVERYONE


****there is also a painting of AIZU's Women's Brigade...I don't
know Japanese...but it looks like the word "Aizu"****

the book is valuable because it tells little stories...for example
Saitou's death on page 149

page 143 the establishment of the Shinsengumi memorial pillar

page 152 policemen
